name: Elle Communications
tag_list: public-relations, pr, communications, marketing, lifestyle, social-enterprise, social-good, business, clients
overview:
Elle Communications was founded on the principles of achieving results, applying high levels of ingenuity and executing conscious public relations, marketing and event planning strategies for clients in creative business and lifestyle spaces. We strictly work with brands that our team feels passionate about, which allows us to maintain a uniquely creative corporate culture and to achieve results our clients never thought possible. We offer PR, marketing, social media, event planning, product placement and celebrity endorsement services.

With expertise and proven results in a wide variety of industries, the progressive team at Elle pride ourselves on taking the path less followed for programs that help our clients stand out in saturated markets. Like our clients, the individuals that comprise Elle Communications are oozing with creativity and passion that is cleverly combined with calculated business strategy and a proactive nature with proven results.

Through an innovative approach and unconventional tactics, this boutique firm has landed placements for clients in such media outlets as the Wall Street Journal, USA Today, New York Times, Los Angeles Times, BusinessWeek, Mashable, CNN, People, UsWeekly, OK!, Vanity Fair, Good Morning America, The Today Show, GOOD, Marie Claire, Redbook, O, The Oprah Magazine, Fast Company, AdAge, Inc., Entrepreneur, TechCrunch, VentureBeat, Cosmopolitan Magazine, Better Homes and Gardens, ABC World News with Diane Sawyer, Women’s Wear Daily, Antenna, NYLON, Refinery29, Thrillist, UrbanDaddy, Wired, Gourmet, Health, Self, Dwell and countless other regional and national online, broadcast and print outlets.

offices.address1: 672 S La Fayette Park Place, Suite 44
